arts.ttl: Atalanta at risk of falling out of top 4 after loss to Lazio
arts.sum: Third-placed Atalanta lost 1-0 at home to Lazio on Sunday for its third straight defeat in Serie A. Lecce was loudly jeered by its home fans despite rallying to draw 1-1 against Venezia in a relegation dogfight and ending a run of five straight defeats.

arts.ttl: Gustav Isaksen Fires Pragmatic Lazio Past Wounded Atalanta
arts.sum: Lazio rebooted their Top Four hopes by earning a hard-fought victory over Atalanta in what was a relatively uneventful affair. Lazio Starting Lineup Marco Baroni had to do without several key players, as Taty Castellanos is working on regaining his best condition, while Matteo Guendouzi was serving a one-match ban. Moreover, Alessio Romagnoli was left […] The post Gustav Isaksen Fires Pragmatic Lazio Past Wounded Atalanta appeared first on The Laziali.

arts.ttl: Lazio Keeping Close Tabs on ‘Magical’ Argentine Linked to Newcastle United
arts.sum: Reports from Argentina claim Lazio are following Boca Juniors winger Kevin Zenon who has been making waves in his home country this season. The Background The 23-year-old climbed the ranks at Union Santa Fe, before being snapped up by Boca Juniors in January 2024 for €3.2 million.
